body_html: For Edward I decided to remove the explicit dependence on TensorFlow and make it part of extras_require. Not ideal, but I think it's the best present solution. Feel free to close this issue—it would be nice though to have this type of recommended advice in the docs.
body_text: For Edward I decided to remove the explicit dependence on TensorFlow and make it part of extras_require. Not ideal, but I think it's the best present solution. Feel free to close this issue—it would be nice though to have this type of recommended advice in the docs.
body: For Edward I decided to remove the explicit dependence on TensorFlow and make it part of `extras_require`. Not ideal, but I think it's the best present solution. Feel free to close this issue—it would be nice though to have this type of recommended advice in the docs.
